About

Taewook Kim is a Ph.D. student in the Dept. of CSE at HKUST. He is advised by Prof. Xiaojuan Ma as a member of the HCI Initiative. He earned his B.S. from Hanyang University on February 2018.

His research in Human-Computer Interaction focuses on Positive Computing and Affective Computing. He is interested in building interactive systems encouraging people more expressive and transparent for their own emotions in Human-Human Communication, so as to abate stresses and tensions in their everyday lives.
